# React Project Setup Instructions

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.
- [x] Scaffold the Project - React app created with Vite
- [x] Install Required Extensions - No additional extensions needed
- [x] Compile the Project - Dependencies installed successfully
- [x] Create and Run Task - Dev server running at http://localhost:5173/
- [x] Launch the Project - Application launched in Simple Browser
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete

## Project Details
- **Framework**: React with Vite
- **Language**: JavaScript
- **Build Tool**: Vite (Experimental Rolldown version)
- **Dev Server**: http://localhost:5173/
- **Purpose**: Modern React application starter template
